item.title: Privacy policy
item.description: Last updated May 13, 2020 COVID Shield has been designed with user privacy as the top priority. We must strike a balance between protecting public health and preserving personal privacy, and COVID Shield takes a privacy-first approach. The COVID Shield app is designed to make it as difficult as possible for COVID Shield or others to link the information you choose to provide to you or your device, and to use this information only to enable exposure notification in the midst of this unprecedented pandemic.
